did.abstract: Correspondence, telegrams, notes, memoranda, clippings, accounts, lists, protocols, reports, inventories, and published materials, relating to the evacuation of the war orphans from Russia to Oudtshoorn, the establishment and operation of the Home, and the care and education of the orphans.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research; materials must be requested at least two business days in advance of intended use.

acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1975.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence of the Office of the Director of the Polish Children's Home: Fr. F. Kubienski (March 13, 1943-November 29, 1943), L. J. Barr (November 29, 1943-June 23, 1944), S. Tarnowicz (June 23, 1944-January 31, 1945), Dr. Z. Skowronski (January 31, 1945-July 18, 1947). Arranged chronologically by directors' tenure and thereunder alphabetically by correspondent.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Letters, telegrams, notes, memoranda, lists, accounts, reports, inventories, protocols, clippings, etc. Arranged aphabetically by subject.
